0.4.name: wordpress/infomoz-glossario
0.4.description: This is the rewrited version of the INFOmoz-Glossario Plugin for Wordpress 2.8 and Wordpress MU. I rewrited the plugin to be compatible with new versions of Wordpress, and to correct some issues that has been reported by users who tested this plugin.
